wlo-ui.wloButton.warning.iconAndIconSrc: You have provided both icon and iconSrc. Please use only one to avoid inconsistencies.
wlo-ui.wloButton.warning.iconOnlyWithLab: You are using variant=\"icon\" and also passed a label. The label will be ignored.
wlo-ui-demo.layout.langMenu.title: Language
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.danger.descripti: Indicates a destructive or irreversible action. Ideal for delete, remove, or critical actions that need user attention. Use with caution.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.danger.title: Danger
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.description: A customizable button component with multiple variants, sizes, icons, and loading states.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.ghost.descriptio: Minimal style button with transparent background. Perfect for subtle actions, like “Learn more”, or in places where too many solid buttons would create visual noise.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.ghost.title: Ghost
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.iconOnly.descrip: A button that shows only an icon. Use when space is limited or when the action is clearly understood through the icon alone. Can be combined with any variant, just set iconOnly to true.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.iconOnly.title: Icon
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.link.description: Styled like a hyperlink. Use when the button’s purpose is to navigate, redirect, or resemble textual links within content areas.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.link.title: Link
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.loading.descript: Represents a loading or processing state. Use loading=true when waiting for an async operation. The label is replaced with a spinner and feedback like “Please wait”.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.loading.title: Loading
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.outline.descript: A neutral, less prominent action. Great for secondary or alternative actions, especially when paired with a filled button like primary or danger. Looks clean and minimal.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.outline.title: Outline
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.primary.descript: The main action button. Use for primary actions on a screen, such as submitting a form or saving data. It should stand out and be used only once per section or screen.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.primary.title: Primary
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.secondary.descri: A supporting action button. Used for secondary actions that are important but not the main focus. Often appears next to a primary button.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.secondary.title: Secondary
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.title: Button
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.withIcon.descrip: A button that displays an icon alongside a label. Use to improve visual recognition of the action. Icons can be placed next to text in any variant to make the intent more intuitive.
wlo-ui-demo.page.button.withIcon.title: With Icon
wlo-ui-demo.page.components.button.descr: Flexible and theme-aware button component. Includes support for icons, states, sizes and interaction modes.
wlo-ui-demo.page.components.button.title: Button
wlo-ui-demo.page.components.pageDescript: Explore reusable UI components built for scalability, customization, and theme consistency.
wlo-ui-demo.page.components.typography.d: A set of text elements with predefined styles such as headings, paragraphs, code, and more — all consistent with the theme.
wlo-ui-demo.page.home.subtitle: Build beautiful Angular interfaces with consistent, reusable components.
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.description: A set of text styles including headings, paragraphs, and utility variants.
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.example.bloc: Used for quoting external content or emphasizing a message.
“Good design is as little design as possible.” — Dieter Rams
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.example.code: Inline or block code with monospace font and background.
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.example.head: Largest heading, used for main titles and prominent section headers.
Build beautiful interfaces, fast.
Heading 1
Second-level heading, ideal for page or section subtitles.
A design system ready to scale with your product.
Heading 2
Third-level heading for grouping related content under h2.
Consistent, accessible, and customizable components.
Heading 3
Smaller heading, used inside components or content sections.
Dark mode? Built-in. Styles? Fully themeable.
Heading 4
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.example.larg: Emphasized inline text larger than base size.
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.example.lead: A larger paragraph text for lead-ins or highlights.
Get started in minutes with prebuilt components.
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.example.list: Unordered list to display grouped items in a vertical list.
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.example.mute: Subtle, less prominent text for hints or secondary content.
Still in early access. Feedback is welcome!
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.example.para: WLO UI is your personal UI toolkit for modern Angular projects.
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.example.smal: Smaller text, typically for helper or metadata content.
wlo-ui-demo.page.typography.title: Typography
